channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The US imposes 25% tariff on Nvidia’s H200 AI chips headed to China
item.description: The Trump administration formalized its 25% cut of H200 chip sales in China with a tariff that applies to certain semiconductors.

item.title: OpenAI Invests in Sam Altman’s New Brain-Tech Startup Merge Labs
item.description: Merge Labs has emerged from stealth with $252 million in funding from OpenAI and others. It aims to use ultrasound to read from and write to the brain...

item.title: Minnesota Is Just the Beginning. California and New York Are ‘Next’
item.description: The Trump administration appears to be planning to leverage the same playbook used in Minnesota to go after other blue states.

item.title: Taiwan to invest $250B in US semiconductor manufacturing
item.description: The U.S. struck a trade deal with Taiwan as the country looks to help boost domestic semiconductor manufacturing.

item.title: AI video startup, Higgsfield, founded by ex-Snap exec, lands $1.3B valuation
item.description: Higgsfield says it's on a $200 million annual revenue run rate. So it opened its previous Series A round back up and sold another $80 million in share...

item.title: Save $50 on the OnePlus Watch 3, Which Has Revolutionary Battery Tech
item.description: Save some cash on this Wear OS smartwatch with a revolutionary battery that can go for five days on a charge (16 days on low-power mode).

item.title: OpenAI invests in Sam Altman’s brain computer interface startup Merge Labs
item.description: Merge Labs is a “research lab” dedicated to “bridging biological and artificial intelligence to maximize human ability.” OpenAI wrote the largest chec...

item.title: Elon Musk’s Grok ‘Undressing’ Problem Isn’t Fixed
item.description: X has placed more restrictions on Grok’s ability to generate explicit AI images, but tests show that the updates have created a patchwork of limitatio...

item.title: Why ICE Can Kill With Impunity
item.description: Over the past decade, US immigration agents have shot and killed more than two dozen people. Not a single agent appears to have faced criminal charges...

item.title: Iran’s internet shutdown is now one of its longest ever, as protests continue
item.description: Iran’s government-imposed internet shutdown enters its second week as authorities continue their violent crackdown on protesters.
